body:
Hacks. They are a Minecraft enhancer (IMO). They make the game unfair and it is cheating. Hacks are punishable. If you use them, sooner or later, you SHALL get caught. A temp ban/perm ban follows. You can't play Avicus anymore. Well done.

So. WHY use them. Resist the urge, no matter HOW tempting it is. You are stronger than Hacks. I am seeing way too many people get banned, many of them friends to me. So please. No use hacks. Please. Or else. You won't want else. Pleaseeeee.
